com.fasterxml.jackson.datatype.hibernate4
Class PersistentCollectionSerializer

java.lang.Object
  com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonSerializer<org.hibernate.collection.spi.PersistentCollection>
      com.fasterxml.jackson.datatype.hibernate4.PersistentCollectionSerializer
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.jsonFormatVisitors.JsonFormatVisitable, com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ser.ContextualSerializer
public class PersistentCollectionSerializer
extends com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonSerializer<org.hibernate.collection.spi.PersistentCollection>
implements com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ser.ContextualSerializer

Wrapper serializer used to handle aspects of lazy loading that can be used for Hibernate collection datatypes.
